amendment.description: Page 166, after 3, insert the following new section: \ SEC. 647. None of the funds appropriated by the Act may be used to plan, enter into, implement, or provide oversight of contracts between the Secretary of the Treasury, or his designee, and any private collection agency.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 10 printed in the Congressional Record to insert at the end of the bill the following new section on page 166, after 3: None of the funds appropriated by the Act may be used to plan, enter into, implement, or provide oversight of contracts between the Secretary of the Treasury, or his designee, and any private collection agency.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Capito amendment (A011) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A011) offered by Mrs. Capito.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Capito amendment (A011) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
